EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2018.S1P Amtrak Promo 9-12-18
EmailTemplate.subject: Let us help cover the cost of your conference travel
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]> Your travel to SpringOne Platform is on us!
Whether by plane, train or automobile, we know traveling to tech conferences can be a pain—but what if you were going to one of the coolest tech conferences around on our dime?
We’re offering to help cover your travel with a $400 discount to SpringOne Platform 2018 <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-amtrak-2018]]>. This year’s event will take place in Washington, D.C. from September 24-27; and brings together leading software companies, enterprises, and cloud experts to collaborate, share knowledge, and create transformational software is taking place.
Check out our recently finalized conference agenda <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/agenda?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-amtrak-2018]]> and sessions <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/sessions?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-amtrak-2018]]> to see what we’ve got in store, including more than 20 main stage speakers, onsite training, and networking opportunities galore.
Use discount code S1P_Travel400 <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register/registration/selectcolor: #00ae9e; text-decoration: none; font-weight: 400;]]> for $400 off your SpringOne Platform ticket.
We hope to see you there, The SpringOne Platform Team
